list.abs: She said the selfsame thing to me ., 她对我讲的是完全一样的事情.
He won two gold medals on the selfsame day ., 他在同一天获得两块金牌.
In the selfsame day was Abraham circumcised , and Ishmael his son ., 正当那日 , 亚伯拉罕和他儿子以实玛利 , 一同受了割礼.
she and i the selfsame folk ., 她与我是一样的人.
saw the selfsame quotation in two newspapers ;, 在两张报纸上看见完全一样的引用;

entry.tran: (用于强调)同一的，完全相同的
entry.def: You use self-same when you want to emphasize that the person or thing mentioned is exactly the same as the one mentioned previously.

example.ex: You find yourself worshipped by the self-same people who beat you up at school.
example.tran: 你发现原来在学校里痛扁你的同一群人现在成了你的崇拜者。

means.word_mean: 1. being the exact same one; not any other:;

"the very man I want to see"
